languages.text: "Я могла оказаться на месте Немезита, а он — на моем, стоило нитям судьбы сплестись чуть иначе. Лишь разность идей отличает нас". {n}Взгляд ее стал задумчивый и глубокий.{/n} "Спасибо за разговор, Домин'{name}. Пусть на время, но он заполнил пустоту, что гложет душу. Как запечатать ее навсегда... мне еще предстоит выяснить. И да поможет Завет Паутины найти верный путь".

traits.locale_text: "Я могла оказаться на месте Немезита, а он на моем, стоило нитям судьбы сплестись чуть иначе. Ибо лишь разность идей отличает нас друг от друга. Сколь много может дать смертному вера. И сколь много она отбирает". {n}Кибела поднимает глаза. Взгляд ее стал задумчивый и глубокий.{/n} "Спасибо, что поговорил{mf||а} со мной, Эним'{name}. Пусть на время, но твои слова заполнили пустоту, что гложила мою душу. Как запечатать ее навсегда... мне еще предстоит выяснить. И да поможет Анн'шини найти верный путь".

languages.text: "I might just as easily have met Nemesite's fate, and he mine. All it would have taken is a different pattern of threads. The only distinction lies in our ideas." {n}Kibellah's gaze has grown pensive.{/n} "Thank you for this conversation, Domin'{name}. It has satiated the void that gnaws at my soul, if only for a time. As for how to seal this chasm for good... that I have yet to find out. May the Tenets of the Web guide me to the truth."
languages.original_text: "Я могла оказаться на месте Немезита, а он — на моем, стоило нитям судьбы сплестись чуть иначе. Лишь разность идей отличает нас". {n}Взгляд ее стал задумчивый и глубокий.{/n} "Спасибо за разговор, Домин'{name}. Пусть на время, но он заполнил пустоту, что гложет душу. Как запечатать ее навсегда... мне еще предстоит выяснить. И да поможет Завет Паутины найти верный путь".

traits.locale_text: "I could have met Nemesite's fate and he mine, and all it would have taken is a different weave of threads. The only difference is in our ideas." {n}Kibellah's gaze has grown pensive.{/n} "Thank you for this conversation, Enim'{name}. It has filled the void gnawing at my soul, if only for a time. As for how to seal this void for good... that I have yet to find out. May Ahn'shini guide me to the truth."

As for how to seal this void for good... that I have yet to find out. May Ahn'shini guide me to the truth."

The only distinction lies in our ideas." {n}Kibellah's gaze has grown pensive.{/n} "Thank you for this conversation, Domin'{name}. It has satiated the void that gnaws at my soul, if only for a time. languages.text: «Podría haber compartido fácilmente el sino de Nemesitio, o él el mío. Tan solo habría bastado con un patrón distinto de hilos. Solo nos diferenciamos por nuestra ideología». {n}Kibellah frunce el ceño, pensativa.{/n} «Gracias por esta conversación, Domin'{name}. Ha saciado el voraz vacío que roe mi alma, aunque solo sea por un momento. Pero sellar definitivamente ese abismo... aún no he averiguado cómo hacerlo. Que la Doctrina me guíe hacia la verdad».
languages.original_text: "I might just as easily have met Nemesite's fate, and he mine. All it would have taken is a different pattern of threads. The only distinction lies in our ideas." {n}Kibellah's gaze has grown pensive.{/n} "Thank you for this conversation, Domin'{name}. It has satiated the void that gnaws at my soul, if only for a time. As for how to seal this chasm for good... that I have yet to find out. May the Tenets of the Web guide me to the truth."

traits.locale_text: «Podría haber compartido fácilmente el sino de Nemesitio, o él el mío. Tan solo habría bastado con un patrón distinto de hilos. Solo nos diferenciamos por nuestra ideología». {n}Kibellah frunce el ceño, pensativa.{/n} «Gracias por esta conversación, Domin'{name}. Ha saciado el voraz vacío que roe mi alma, aunque solo sea por un momento. Pero sellar definitivamente ese abismo... aún no he averiguado cómo hacerlo. Que la Doctrina me guíe hacia la verdad».

languages.text: 「私は、たやすくネメサイトの運命をたどっていたかもしれない。同様に、彼も私の運命を。必要なのは、異なる糸の模様だけ。唯一の違いは、私たちの考えにある」{n}キベラの視線は愁いを帯びている。{/n}「この話をさせてくれてありがとう、ドミン・{name}。私の魂を苦しめる空虚感を、一時的にとはいえ満たしてくれたわ。どうすればこの裂け目を永遠に封じられるのか…それを私は見出さなければならない。ウェブの教義が真実へと導いてくださいますように」
languages.original_text: "I might just as easily have met Nemesite's fate, and he mine. All it would have taken is a different pattern of threads. The only distinction lies in our ideas." {n}Kibellah's gaze has grown pensive.{/n} "Thank you for this conversation, Domin'{name}. It has satiated the void that gnaws at my soul, if only for a time. As for how to seal this chasm for good... that I have yet to find out. May the Tenets of the Web guide me to the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、たやすくネメサイトの運命をたどっていたかもしれない。同様に、彼も私の運命を。必要なのは、異なる糸の模様だけ。唯一の違いは、私たちの考えにある」{n}キベラの視線は愁いを帯びている。{/n}「この話をさせてくれてありがとう、ドミン・{name}。私の魂を苦しめる空虚感を、一時的にとはいえ満たしてくれたわ。どうすればこの裂け目を永遠に封じられるのか…それを私は見出さなければならない。ウェブの教義が真実へと導いてくださいますように」

languages.text: “我原本很有可能步上涅墨斯特的后尘，而他本来也很可能会踏上我的道路，只要换一换我们所编织的图案就是了。我们唯一的区别，仅仅在于我们的信念不同。”{n}绮贝菈的目光显得若有所思。{/n}“谢谢你与我进行这场谈话，秘者{name}。尽管这仅仅只是暂时的，但你的话语填补了啃噬我灵魂的空虚。至于该如何彻底填满这个鸿沟……我还没找到答案，愿教义指引我找到真理。”
languages.original_text: "I might just as easily have met Nemesite's fate, and he mine. All it would have taken is a different pattern of threads. The only distinction lies in our ideas." {n}Kibellah's gaze has grown pensive.{/n} "Thank you for this conversation, Domin'{name}. It has satiated the void that gnaws at my soul, if only for a time. As for how to seal this chasm for good... that I have yet to find out. May the Tenets of the Web guide me to the truth."

traits.locale_text: “我原本很有可能步上涅墨斯特的后尘，而他本来也很可能会踏上我的道路，只要换一换我们所编织的图案就是了。我们唯一的区别，仅仅在于我们的信念不同。”{n}绮贝菈的目光显得若有所思。{/n}“谢谢你与我进行这场谈话，秘者{name}。尽管这仅仅只是暂时的，但你的话语填补了啃噬我灵魂的空虚。至于该如何彻底填满这个鸿沟……我还没找到答案，愿教义指引我找到真理。”

languages.text: "Mich hätte genauso gut Nemesits Schicksal ereilen können und ihn das meine. Es hätte dafür lediglich eines anderen Musters von Fäden bedurft. Der einzige Unterschied liegt in unseren Vorstellungen." {n}Kibellahs Blick ist nachdenklich geworden.{/n} "Danke für dieses Gespräch, Domin'{name}. Es hat die Leere gesättigt, die an meiner Seele nagt, wenn auch nur vorübergehend. Was die endgültige Versiegelung dieser Kluft angeht ... das muss ich noch herausfinden. Mögen mich die Grundsätze zur Wahrheit führen."
languages.original_text: "I might just as easily have met Nemesite's fate, and he mine. All it would have taken is a different pattern of threads. The only distinction lies in our ideas." {n}Kibellah's gaze has grown pensive.{/n} "Thank you for this conversation, Domin'{name}. It has satiated the void that gnaws at my soul, if only for a time. As for how to seal this chasm for good... that I have yet to find out. May the Tenets of the Web guide me to the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Mich hätte genauso gut Nemesits Schicksal ereilen können und ihn das meine. Es hätte dafür lediglich eines anderen Musters von Fäden bedurft. Der einzige Unterschied liegt in unseren Vorstellungen." {n}Kibellahs Blick ist nachdenklich geworden.{/n} "Danke für dieses Gespräch, Domin'{name}. Es hat die Leere gesättigt, die an meiner Seele nagt, wenn auch nur vorübergehend. Was die endgültige Versiegelung dieser Kluft angeht ... das muss ich noch herausfinden. Mögen mich die Grundsätze zur Wahrheit führen."

languages.text: « J'aurais tout aussi bien pu connaître le sort de Némésite, et lui le mien. Il aurait suffi d'une infime nuance dans les fils du destin. La seule distinction réside dans nos schémas de pensée. » {n}Le regard de Kibellah se fait pensif.{/n} « Merci pour cette conversation, Domin'{name}. Elle a eu l'avantage de combler ne serait-ce que temporairement le vide qui ronge mon âme. Quant à la manière de refermer définitivement ce gouffre béant... je ne l'ai pas encore trouvée. Puissent les Préceptes de la Toile me montrer la voie de la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "I might just as easily have met Nemesite's fate, and he mine. All it would have taken is a different pattern of threads. The only distinction lies in our ideas." {n}Kibellah's gaze has grown pensive.{/n} "Thank you for this conversation, Domin'{name}. It has satiated the void that gnaws at my soul, if only for a time. As for how to seal this chasm for good... that I have yet to find out. May the Tenets of the Web guide me to the truth."

languages.text: "Ben Nemezit'in kaderini, o da benimkini yaşayabilirdi. İpliklerin farklı bir örüntüsü yeterdi. Aradaki tek fark, fikirlerimizde saklı." {n}Kibellah, düşüncelere dalıyor.{/n} "Bu sohbet için teşekkür ederim Domin'{name}. Kısa bir süreliğine de olsa ruhumu kemiren boşluğu tatmin etti. Nasıl kalıcı olarak giderileceğine gelecek olursak... Onu henüz keşfetmiş değilim. Dilerim Ağ'ın İlkeleri bana hakikatin yolunu gösterir."
languages.original_text: "I might just as easily have met Nemesite's fate, and he mine. All it would have taken is a different pattern of threads. The only distinction lies in our ideas." {n}Kibellah's gaze has grown pensive.{/n} "Thank you for this conversation, Domin'{name}. It has satiated the void that gnaws at my soul, if only for a time. As for how to seal this chasm for good... that I have yet to find out. May the Tenets of the Web guide me to the truth."
